Description: Ostracon, fragment of shoulder of a red-brown pottery ribbed jar with base of one handle surviving, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394299) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394299)
